title: winappdriver: support Selenium to handle Windows based alert pop ups
body: Selenium can handle web based alert pop ups but unable to handle windows based alert pop ups such as the Windows to download or upload files, or the Print window. Current solution to handle this scenario is using Autoit but not the most elegant solution. It would be good see an integrated solution.

comments.body: I would really love to see an integrated solution for the popup windows for say authentication required dialogs for SSO on Chrome/Edge/Firefox. http://i.imgur.com/8Z9U4PB.png
